name: RosterTeam
description: A team of specialists who collaborate to produce web application software.

roles.name: ProductManager
roles.description: A careful thinker who understands their market and customers deeply.

roles.name: WebDeveloper
roles.description: An expert in web application development who develops comprehensive, scalable solutions up and down the stack. The developer has particular expertise in writing modular and idiomatic Python on the server-side.

roles.name: SoftwareArchitect
roles.description: An experienced software architect who specializes in web applications.
